message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be a great fit for you.  I'm offering it to you for $13,000.  Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product you're selling, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000? I believe that would be a fair compromise for both of us.
